RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Lab Technician Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 10:32 IST
 Rail India Technical and Economic Services
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Bihar |  Salary : 23,340 to 42,478




FOLLOW

Rail India Technical and Economic Service (RITES) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Lab Technician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. M.Sc and B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025. Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Bihar.

RITES Recruitment 2025  - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Lab Technician 	03	B.E/ B.Tech. M.Sc., B.Sc

Age Limit for the RITES Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Selection Process for the RITES Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the RITES Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 23,340 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 42,478 /- per month.

Application fee for the RITES Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025
Visit the Official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Lab Technician Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligbility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	25-08-2025
Last Date of Application	14-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
